title: Courses
description: Manage your learning management system courses, modules, and lessons.
createCourseDescription: Create a new course with modules and lessons for your learners.
noCoursesDescription: Get started by creating your first course with engaging content for your learners.

fields.title: Course Title
fields.titleDescription: Enter a clear, descriptive title for your course.
fields.descriptionDescription: Provide a detailed description of what learners will gain from this course.
fields.priceDescription: Set the price for this course. Use 0 for free courses.

modules.title: Modules
modules.description: Organize your course content into logical modules.
modules.noModulesDescription: Start organizing your course by creating modules.

lessons.title: Lessons
lessons.description: Add engaging lessons to your modules.
lessons.noLessonsDescription: Add lessons to this module to start building your course content.

settings.title: Course Settings
settings.description: Configure your course settings and publication status.

fields.is_publishedDescription: Make this course available to learners.
fields.sequential_completionDescription: Require learners to complete lessons in order.
fields.passing_scoreDescription: Default minimum score required to pass quizzes.

enrollment.title: Enrollments
enrollment.noEnrollmentsDescription: Students will appear here once they enroll in your course.

learner.learnerDashboardDescription: Track your learning progress and discover new courses
learner.noCoursesDescription: Check back soon for new learning opportunities
learner.courseViewDescription: View your course content and track your progress
